isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Service Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - EVRT® Electronically Controlled Turbocharger - Inspection - Checking Axial End Play

figure.caption: Setup for checking axial end play

step1.para: Place VGT assembly onto a clean workbench.
Position dial indicator magnetic base onto a suitable location. Place tip of indicator onto the turbine shaft and zero the indicator needle with face graduations.
Move the shaft back and forth by hand. Record turbine shaft end play on dial indicator. If the reading exceeds specifications, replace the VGT assembly.

Orient VGT assembly so that actuator linkage can be easily accessed and viewed. Move the actuator shaft through its entire travel. The actuator shaft should rotate 90° and return under spring tension.
